text: Rives-de-l'Yon is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Saint-Florent-des-Bois (the seat) and Chaillé-sous-les-Ormeaux.Arrêté préfectoral 28 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Rives-de-l'Yon
